message.body: Hey Shawn, how's it going? When do you get back? I was wondering if you might be able to help me load up and install a show on either October 8th or 9th
Hi Hunter. Sure I'll help. Is the show going to be at pageant? I'll be back the evening of the 4th. The only thing is that I don't know what my work sche
dule is going to be like yet and I going to be crazy busy getting those prints together and in the mail... but mostly it's if I'm working for Norma, is t
he main thing. Would you happen to have a postal scale I could borrow? Thanks
